chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is having the following problem:
The phone no longer charges with a USB cable charger, we've tried several. It only charges with a wireless charger.
Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stock for exchange. Instead, we have processed the full refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
JY
